item.title: Beogram 4000: A First Look at a New Arrival from Berlin
item.description:
My first project in Germany this year is a Beogram 4000 turntable. While the packaging from Berlin was good, the dust cover was cracked in one corner, likely due to inadequate protection by the seller. Thankfully, the turntable itself is in decent cosmetic condition. The aluminum surfaces are mostly unscathed, with some minor scratches from the tonearm assembly, probably because the transport lock wasn’t engaged. The wooden base is also in good shape...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4000-a-first-look-at-a-new-arrival-from-berlin/
